description: ACM is organizing a technical workshop on Web Development using React and Node.js. We expect around 150 students to attend. The workshop will include hands-on sessions and a Q&A panel with industry experts.

Synapse cultural committee is hosting a mini exhibition showcasing student art, photography, and creative projects. The event aims to promote creativity and provide a platform for students to display their talents.
stallDescription: Art exhibition stall with display boards, lighting arrangements, and space for 20+ artworks. We will also have a small interactive corner for live sketching demonstrations.
